ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrike: Ah m-- Quickstrike began to explain, but saw the poor mouse go unconscious. Oh dang it! He looked at her, then turned to see Black Arachnia

Quickstrike:




"Ah'm--" Quickstrike began to explain, but saw the poor mouse go 
unconscious. "Oh dang it!" He looked at her, then turned to see Black 
Arachnia and Transulas. He squinted one bright optic at clone.

He said while he went for the straps on Dark Mouse. "Ah don't care what ya 
say, spider-bot! Ah think ah heard this bot b'fore. And ah think she was 
trailin' boss-bot's group out in th' forest." He broke one strap with the 
cobra jaw, ripping it with it's sharp, few teeth far in the back. Just then, 
he saw the Maximal symbol on her. Quickstrike's hopes dropped. He slipped 
his arms from the table and slumped his shoulder.

Oh, slag. She was a Maximal.

But it couldn't be. He swore he heard her and smelt her before. Quickstrike 
was disgraced.

He went on fighting mentally with himself, trying to think back in the 
forest when he leg back damaged, trying to find out if it was really her in 
that same forest.


>From: "Trans formers" <logomorph@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Fri, 16 Jun 2000 15:56:49 MDT
>
>::DarkMouse::
>
>*she heard a soft voice near her and two others futher away.*
>"Who are you? Where am I? Why can't I move?  oohhh."
>
>*She winced at the pain.  It was excrutiating. She could only see the hazy
>figure of a bot standing near her. She tried to focus her optics to see who
>this bot was.  Her side throbbed and it let out a sudden jolt of pain.*
>
>"AHHHHHH!"
>
>*She passed out from the pain*
>
>----Original Message------
> >From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> >To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> >Subject: Neo Beast Wars
> >Date: Fri, 16 Jun 2000 17:44:27 EDT
> >Quickstrike:
> >
> >Quickstrike's spark pulsed quickly as he saw the female mouse wake. He
> >watched as she struggled with her wounds under the straps. He could tell
> >clearly that she was in great pain.
> >
> >He almost felt sorry for her. He stepped forward, with a curious, hurtful
> >look in his eyes. He was going to do something. He was, after all, a
> >gentlebot when he wanted to be. He knew there was one enemy near-by, and
> >another that could knock his head off just for interfering. But slag 
>those
> >two, he was curious, and had to find out.
> >
> >He quickly approached the table where she layed straped, listening
> >carefully
> >to the two spiders behind him. He stared intesnsely at Dark Mouse.
> >
> >"Calm down," he said to her, barely thinking.
